title: Jinx Rocket Hitbox
body:
Oh Yeah! That definitely hit!
http://imgur.com/KSGG9y6

> [{quoted}](name=groovylord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uuEFsIMs,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2016-11-13T04:09:21.438+0000)
>
> #Gotem >:)

I was expecting an useless post. Ignoring the actual problem
You realize Rioters are regular people, right? And that not every Rioter is part of the bug fixing team?
you realize that is jynx's dev right?

Didn't know exactly where to put this, just to let others know you're right.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/TibiO6u0-re-intro-august-groovylord-browning-champion-designrd
Do the people that initially designed a champion continue to work to fix their bugs?

Sometimes. Riot does not have a dedicated bug department. It is up to a person who is familiar with X section of the code to decide they have the time and take it apon them selves. Bug fixes can be considered in-between tasks at Riot or mini projects. Which is why things like death recap or Jayce transformation audio bugs never get fixed. To can be decided that it is to much work and not game critical or even important. 

But what i think the OP was more looking for was a yes/no on intentional and a note saying it will be added to the list. Or I will pass this onto someone to look into, any rioter could of done this. 

Groovylord is another example of rioter dismissing and not understanding the player base. Considering this an account from EUNE that made this thread; it is feeding back into no one cares about ENUE mentality. Jokes would of been fine if there was one legit response also.

> [{quoted}](name=Angry Monster,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uuEFsIMs,comment-id=001c00010002000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-14T18:19:46.658+0000)
> But what i think the OP was more looking for was a yes/no on intentional and a note saying it will be added to the list. Or I will pass this onto someone to look into, any rioter could of done this. 

Do you really think so? I thought he was posting for the amusement. I might be mistaken, though I think he should have explicitly stated that it was a complaint.

You never know. I could be totally wrong and the OP is posting as a joke. But  then this would be in the wrong section of the boards. 

I tend to take the section divides a bit more seriously than others, But if everyone did then we know what is a legit conversation and what is a joke piece.
It's not about rocket hitbox, its about your champion.

Always pay attention to a champions feet when trying to actually determine hitbox sizes. Udyr is leaning forward heavily, but the hitbox is around his feet making it appear like a miss instead of the absolute edge.

well, but the rocket didn't even hit the red buff circle, which is further out than his feet. I can't defend that. Usually, I'm on the side of the developers with this sort of thing, but that hitbox is legitimately pretty big. Almost seems like a bug.
dunno why you're getting downvoted, it's the truth
All the hit boxes in this game are fucked up.

http://i.imgur.com/XmpChkg.png/?noredirect

I dunno what you mean.
Jinx uses anti air missiles. They detonate in proximity to a target.

Yeah, the hit boxes for both Udyr and the rocket are waaaaay off.

https://s12.postimg.org/3qpcmafx9/invisible_death.jpg

This is immediately before the explosion.

> [{quoted}](name=Chocolate Frost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uuEFsIMs,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-12T13:54:10.117+0000)
>
> Yeah, the hit boxes for both Udyr and the rocket are waaaaay off.
> 
> https://s12.postimg.org/3qpcmafx9/invisible_death.jpg
> 
> This is immediately before the explosion.

You can also see how the explosion, which is centred on Udyr rather than rocket, originates miles away from where the rocket would've hit.

You Only Need To Get Gud and Doge the Skill Shot

Ashe's arrow says hi.
Dat one tricky pixel

> [{quoted}](name=Nostormo,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uuEFsIMs,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-11-12T15:05:17.301+0000)
>
> Dat one tricky pixel

actually thats a 3D game not 2D Platformer
I am not really sure if pixels have anything to do here. I think its probably more like 3D mesh
Dat one tricky _polygon_.

Lol, yeah, but the hitboxes are still 2D format. True, they might be in form of vector equations and intersections might be counted not via elemental points but another equations, but I am nearly sure the game doesn't check intersetion within meshes.

That rocket **clearly** hit a molecule of your spirit.

#_molecule_

It was probably an 
**atom**

I am actually really curious as to when things like this will be fixed. Is it really _that_ hard to make the visuals match the hitbox or opposite?

---------

But when it comes to Jinx, it ain't her hixboxes I'm worried about...
_No, it ain't a joke about a flat land._

https://1drv.ms/i/s!AuFMZD__7mN2gUz0rqNeqq2_CXwa

Girl is freakin' huge!

As to the bugs - sry, _features_ - I can top that one: played Ascension today. As Kayle, under the effect of the ult. Got the message "you have ascended"...then I died (killed by a hammer-smashing Jayce).

Also:
https://youtu.be/58jJRr0Fsm8?t=862

_Old issue, but gold issue._

That's an issue with Kayle (specifically Aether Wing)

http://i.imgur.com/DTvIV91.jpg/?noredirect

To be fair, her wingspan has way too much ~~power~~ model budget. If you made her body the standard size, she'd be huge!

This isn't *Rocket* Science.
It was just the lag between the server and the player.
Happens all the time.
in firecracker jinx his rocket is more small than normal skin so the hitbox its a litle bit bugged{{champion:222}}
I think this was mentioned in the patch notes. Where jinx can cast Q mid ult to make it appear further behind than what it actually its. Luckily they claimed to have fixed this.
